MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CW9 and CW10 postcode areas of Northwich and Middlewich, affecting properties in Byley, Rudheath, Whatcroft and the surrounding area. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut, and became aware of this at 11:40 am. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a grounded overhead line and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 2:30 pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:31 pm on 19th February, 2021.
